scripts.pack: bun -e "const fs = require('fs'); const p = 'script/script.json'; const j = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p)); j.remoteResource.hash = crypto.randomUUID().toUpperCase(); const v = j.version.split('.'); v[2] = parseInt(v[2] || 0) + 1; j.version = v.join('.'); fs.writeFileSync(p, JSON.stringify(j, null, 2)); console.log('Version:', j.version)" && rm -f script.zip && cd script && zip -r ../script.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX/*'
scripts.pack:release: bun -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); const p = 'script/script.json'; const j = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p)); j.remoteResource.hash = crypto.randomUUID().toUpperCase(); j.version = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(p, JSON.stringify(j, null, 2)); console.log('Version:', j.version)" && rm -f script.zip && cd script && zip -r ../script.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX/*'
scripts.build:linux: bun build ./ws.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/f11esync-linux-x64 && cd dist && zip f11esync-linux-x64.zip f11esync-linux-x64 && rm f11esync-linux-x64
scripts.build:linux-arm: bun build ./ws.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=dist/f11esync-linux-arm64 && cd dist && zip f11esync-linux-arm64.zip f11esync-linux-arm64 && rm f11esync-linux-arm64
scripts.build:mac: bun build ./ws.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/f11esync-darwin-x64 && cd dist && zip f11esync-darwin-x64.zip f11esync-darwin-x64 && rm f11esync-darwin-x64
scripts.build:mac-arm: bun build ./ws.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/f11esync-darwin-arm64 && cd dist && zip f11esync-darwin-arm64.zip f11esync-darwin-arm64 && rm f11esync-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:win: bun build ./ws.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/f11esync-windows-x64.exe && cd dist && zip f11esync-windows-x64.zip f11esync-windows-x64.exe && rm f11esync-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:all: bun run build:linux && bun run build:linux-arm && bun run build:mac && bun run build:mac-arm && bun run build:win
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
